com.mobius.vdrapi
Class TopicSearchConstraint

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.mobius.vdrapi.TopicSearchConstraint
public class TopicSearchConstraint
extends Object

Specifies a search constraint relationship when searching topic data. This relationship matches a constraint against Topic IDs with a constraint against topic items.

Field Summary

          The constraint against Topic IDs.
 SearchConstraint topicItemConstraint
